MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 7:11PM in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon following reports of broken overhead line equipment. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:15PM on 19th February 2021.
